sentences.simplifiedText: 因为我在高中的优秀表现，我获得了大学的全额奖学金。
sentences.traditionalText: 因為我在高中的優秀表現，我獲得了大學的全額獎學金。
sentences.pinyin: Yīnwèi wǒ zài gāozhōng de yōuxiù biǎoxiàn, wǒ huòdéle dàxué de quán'é jiǎngxuéjīn.
sentences.translation: Because of my excellent performance in high school, I received a full scholarship to university.
